meanings.definition: A breed that is a subdivision of a larger breed.
meanings.sent1: The poodle is a popular subbreed of the dog family.
meanings.sent2: The farmer decided to raise a subbreed of chickens known for their colorful feathers.
meanings.sent3: The subbreed of rabbits with floppy ears always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cars, the electric vehicle is a futuristic subbreed.
meanings.sent5: The subbreed of roses in the garden added a beautiful variety of colors.

meanings.definition: To classify or categorize a breed into smaller groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist will subbreed the fish species to study their genetic variations.
meanings.sent2: It is important to subbreed the plants based on their resistance to diseases.
meanings.sent3: I will subbreed my book collection into genres for easier organization.
meanings.sent4: The zookeeper decided to subbreed the monkeys according to their behavior patterns.
meanings.sent5: She plans to subbreed the vegetables in her garden to maximize their growth potential.
